A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This Movie is a disgRace.  Critics cozying up to Disney is the only reason for the high critics score. Rian Johnson has helmed a cinematic Titanic.  The Action is rubbish. THe story elements are scattergun. the SJW overtones are heavy handed and unwanted. Finn and Poe are turned into jokes. Leia is made a mary poppins clone\, and what they did to Luke is nothing short of disgusting. The heart and sole of the original trilogy has been turned into a defeated angry old man. Less than a shadow of the character we all loved.  Admiral Ackbar's death was a throw away.  Of the new characters General Holdo was criminally stupid. She had no idea how to handle a simple situation.  Rose Tico was a total waste of space finally putting her own selfishness a head of the needs of the group.  To sum up this film is rubbish. It will destroy the fan base and probably sink Star Wars altogether.
